1.20.1.1.20.1-1.1.0.1:
Fixed crash that could happen, when changing dimension
Fixed crash when using withÂ Better Combat
Changed license to MIT
1.20.1.1.20.1-1.1.0.0:
Updated to 1.20.1
Added the possibility to disable individual armor slots
Added the possibility to disable the individual crafting input slots (the crafting result slot is disabled automatically if all the 4 input slots are disabled)
It is now possible to disable/enable slots for individual players, instead of just globally
Items, effects, and commands can now affect the available slots
Modifiers added by items and effects can be added using datapacks

1.18.1.1.18.1-1.0.5.0:
Compatibility with Minecraft 1.18.1
Allows increasing the hotbar size above the vanilla 9 slots, although the behavior might be unpredictable (also keep in mind that the slots use Minecraft's slot IDs, so the additional hotbar slots begin in the upper left corner of the 3x9 grid)
Changed the former common config into server config

1.16.5.1.16.5-1.0.4.1:
Uses Mixin instead of RenderGameOverlayEvent.Pre, as previously canceling the event caused some mods not render their stuff
Might not work with mods that Mixin IngameGui, if that happens - use the previous version
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.0.4.0:
Made compatible with most modded containers, by using Mixins instead of Forge events
Fixed offhand slot being rendered in the creative inventory, even if disabled
Removed the "defaultTooltipGUIs" config option, as it should not be needed anymore
Added client-side "hideOffhand" config option, allowing the player to hide the offhand slot from the inventory without disabling its functionality
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.0.3.1: Added support for GUIs that are using the Mantle's MultiModuleScreen
